diagnosticString.name: hpoa:internalDataError
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device identification data error

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:managementProcessorError
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Error
Error - lost communication with iLO.
Error

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:thermalWarning
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Temperature Warning

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:thermalDanger
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Critical temperature threshold reached

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:ioConfigurationError
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: I/O mismatch detected. Please see port mapping information.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:devicePowerRequestError
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Insufficient enclosure power

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:insufficientCooling
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Insufficient fans for enclosure cooling

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:deviceLocationError
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Incorrect location for proper device cooling

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:deviceFailure
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Error

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:deviceDegraded
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device is reporting an internal degraded status

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:i2cBuses
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Error

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:redundancy
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Error

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:acFailure
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Error

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:deviceMissing
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Partner device not found
Fan is needed in this bay for current Fan Rule
Fan is needed in this bay for current Fan Rule

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:devicePowerSequence
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Partner blade not powered on
Partner blade already powered on

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:deviceBonding
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Inappropriate device in adjacent bay

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:profileUnassignedError
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Not configured for Virtual Connect

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:deviceNotSupported
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: The device is not supported by Hewlett-Packard

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:networkConfiguration
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: iLO network configuration problem, check connectivity to iLO default gateway

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:tooLowPowerRequest
diagnosticString.successStatusLabel: Blade reported an abnormally low power requirement
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Blade reported an abnormally low power requirement

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:callHP
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Alert - Contact HP Support for Customer Advisory c01064842.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:deviceInformational
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Refer to the active Onboard Administrator system log for more information on this device.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:storageDeviceMissing
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Storage not ready
Storage not ready. Please see storage configuration application for more information.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:firmwareMismatch
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Mismatch detected. For more information check the Firmware Update page.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:deviceMixMatch
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Mixing different power supply models is not supported. All power supplies in the enclosure must be the same part number. Please replace this power supply with the proper part number.
This fan model is not supported in this enclosure. Please replace this fan with the proper part number.
Mixing different fan models is not supported. All fans in the enclosure must be the same part number. Please replace this fan with the proper part number.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:grpcapError
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: iLO has not responded to the previous 12 power capping requests. Resetting iLO may help.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:imlRecordedErrors
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Please replace the following memory modules:

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:duplicateMgmtIpAddress
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: A duplicate management processor IP address was detected. Check management processor network settings and/or EBIPA configuration.
A duplicate interconnect management IP address was detected. Check interconnect management network settings and/or EBIPA configuration.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:callHPNonInfo
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: HP strongly recommends replacing this power supply at the customer's earliest possible convenience pursuant to Customer Advisory c01519680.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:unsupportedMezz
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Server blade contains an unsupported mezzanine card. Please replace with a supported mezzanine card.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:deviceInvalidPowerValue
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: This blade reported an unusually high power allocation value. Please see customer advisory c01668472.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:devicePicFwVersion
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: The power management controller firmware on this blade must be upgraded. Please see customer advisory c01668472.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:mezzCard
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: The blade requires a proper mezzanine card to partner.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:sblMissing
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: This blade is missing a Blade Link.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:deviceFirmwareManagement
diagnosticString.successStatusLabel: The blade is currently in firmware management mode.
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: The blade is currently in firmware management mode.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:trayOpen
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Disk Tray is OPEN.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:unknownBladeType
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Blade is not supported by this OA firmware version. OA firmware update is required.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:efuse
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: The E-Fuse on the blade has failed. Recovery may be possible by issuing the CLI RESET SERVER command or removal / re-insertion of blade. If failure persists contact HP customer support.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:locationDevice
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: A location services error has occurred. Data might be corrupted.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:batteryIsLow
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Replace Battery

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyDiscovery
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed during device discovery.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusySasStorage
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until SAS storage is ready.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyPartnering
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until device is configured for partnership.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyVcProfile
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until VC profile is applied.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyOaInit
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until the OA has completed initialization.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyPowerDelay
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until the configured Power Delay for this bay has elapsed.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyEFM
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until Firmware Management process completes.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyIomDiscovery
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until interconnect discovery is complete.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusySettings
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until device settings are updated. Please retry power operation.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyPartnerDiscovery
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until potential partner devices are discovered.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyIomReady
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until corresponding interconnect is ready.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyIomMissing
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until corresponding interconnect is inserted into enclosure.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusySasMezz
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed until SAS Mezz discovery is complete.

diagnosticString.name: hpoa:powerBusyDiscoveryMmp
diagnosticString.failedStatusLabel: Device power delayed during MMP Blade Link device discovery.
